channel.title: How to make a custom Sprite Only Item?
channel.description:
I wanna make an item, that isn't going to use a model, but its going to be kinda like all the other items that you get like fish and stuff where there is only a sprite of the item and it does things when you click on it. I was wanting to make an item where you select an option and in the chat box it outputs a message. Kinda like eating food does, also, I was wondering if I could make an item that makes your skills decrease like beer does.
HOW DO YOU DO THIS?

item.title: How to make a custom Sprite Only Item?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Actually, I’m pretty sure you have to model the inventory icon, but I could be wrong.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a custom Sprite Only Item?
